tags.name: zui-radio-group
tags.description:
### Example
```html
<zui-radio-group select="1">
  <zui-radio identifier="1" checked></zui-radio>
  <zui-radio identifier="2" checked></zui-radio>
</zui-radio-group>
```

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: The selected value associated with a corresponding zui-radio's identifier

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for this radio group used only for a11y purposes

properties.name: selected
properties.description: The selected value associated with a corresponding zui-radio's identifier

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label for this radio group used only for a11y purposes
